By signing up, you accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.\nThis information is collected by COMUTO SA for the purposes of creating account, managing your booking, using and improving our services and ensuring the security of our platform. \nYou have rights on your personal data and can exercise them by contacting UD Car Rental through our Contact form. You can learn more about your rights and how we handle your personal data in our Privacy Policy.

Your booking has been confirmed. A confirmation email will be sent shortly.

Privacy Policy for AYA Rental App Effective Date: [Insert Date]
This Privacy Policy explains how AYA Rental collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our mobile app and services.
1. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: • Personal Info: Name, email address, phone number, driver’s license, date of birth. • Payment Info: Credit/debit card details (processed via secure third-party payment gateway). • Location Data: GPS location for vehicle tracking and service delivery. • Usage Data: App interactions, device type, operating system.
2. How We Use Your Information We use your data to: • Create and manage user accounts. • Process bookings and payments. • Communicate with you about your reservations. • Improve app functionality and user experience. • Comply with legal requirements.
3. Sharing of Information We may share your information with: • Service providers (e.g., payment processors, customer support). • Law enforcement or regulatory authorities if required by law. • Insurance providers in case of accidents or damage claims.
4. Data Security We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
5. Data Retention We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
6. Your Rights Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at [Insert Email] to make a request.
7. Cookies & Tracking The App may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and gather usage analytics.
Enable dark mode for better visibility in low light conditions.
Stay updated with the latest features for a seamless rental experience.
Get instant updates about your bookings and exclusive offers.

1. Introduction Welcome to AYA Rental Car. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the AYA Rental mobile application (the "App") and any services provided through it. By using our App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the App.
2. Eligibility You must be at least 21 years old and hold a valid drivers license to rent a vehicle using our service. Additional age or license restrictions may apply depending on your location.
3. User Account To access our services, you must create an account with accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials.
4. Booking & Payment All vehicle rentals are subject to availability. Users must pay at the time of booking through accepted payment methods. Prices shown include applicable taxes unless stated otherwise.
5. Cancellation & Refunds Cancellations made at least 48 hours before the scheduled pickup time may be eligible for a full refund. Late cancellations or no-shows may be non-refundable.
6. Vehicle Use You agree to use the rented vehicle responsibly and return it in the same condition. You are liable for any traffic violations, tolls, or damages incurred during the rental period.
7. Prohibited Conduct You may not: • Use the vehicle for unlawful purposes. • Sublet or transfer your booking to another person. • Tamper with the vehicle or its tracking system.
8. Limitation of Liability AYA Rental Car is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the App or our vehicles.
9. Termination We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App if you violate these Terms.
10. Changes to Terms We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes means you accept the new Terms.
11. Governing Law These Terms are governed by the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction]. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Douala Cameroon.
